participant_1.background:
I have always enjoyed the company of animals in fantasy fiction books, but I do not have any pets of my own.
i love non gmo foods.
i would like to try sky diving.
i want to teach kids in elementary school.
I have a lot of feelings, and I like to write them down in my journal.

participant_2.background:
I have a large family due to my viking heritage.
My Nintendo 64 is probably my most valued possession because it was my first console and it has a lot of sentimental value to me.
I'm not sure of my current weight, but I'm working on it.
i do not know why my sister in law dislikes me.
I like to travel and document my experiences on my blog.

content.text: Hello there! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! I'm just excited to be skydiving this weekend.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've always wanted to try it, but I'm a little bit scared.
It's definitely scary, but it's also a lot of fun. I'm sure you would love it.
I'm glad you're excited about it! What are you most looking forward to about the experience?
I think I'm most looking forward to the feeling of free fall. It's supposed to be amazing.
That sounds like it would be a lot of fun. I'm sure you'll have a great time.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to read, write, and travel. I also like to spend time with my friends and family.
Those all sound like great hobbies. I love to read and travel too. Do you have any favorite books or places you've been to?

I'm really into fantasy fiction right now. I've been reading a lot of books by Brandon Sanderson. As for places I've been to, I've been to a lot of different countries in Europe. My favorite place was probably Iceland.
I've never been to Iceland, but it sounds amazing! I've always wanted to go to Europe.
It's definitely worth a visit. There are so many beautiful places to see.
I'm sure it is. Well, it was nice talking to you. I hope you have a great time skydiving this weekend!
Thanks! I hope so too. It was nice talking to you too!
